{"blocks":[{"key":"7t3l3","text":"Re-read the sample on the flow cytometer using the same laser parameters. Record the median fluorescence on the x channel for at least 200 cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab3v0","text":"Calculate the change in median fluorescence between the stained and unstained sample. This is indicative of the level of neutral lipids present in the cell","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a66tq","text":"If comparing between taxa of different sizes, size correction may be advisable. This may be done by dividing the change in median fluorescence by the equivalent spherical size, approximated from forward scatter which is measured in tandem during the flow cytometry analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
